summary.span: Represents a collection of objects.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示的集合对象存储在， ，或。This class represents the collection of objects stored in a , , or . 有关和类，该集合表示控件的整个菜单结构。For the and classes, this collection represents the entire menu structure for the control. 有关类，此集合表示与关联的子菜单项的列表。For the class, this collection represents the list of submenu items associated with the . 和方法使你能够添加和从集合中移除各个菜单项。The and methods enable you to add and remove individual menu items from the collection. 你还可以使用方法从集合中移除所有菜单项。You can also use the method to remove all the menu items from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类要求你将此集合关联与派生自的类，如， ，或类。This class requires that you associate the collection with a class that derives from , such as the , , or class. 由于你必须指定与此集合关联的菜单，你不能创建多个菜单项集合，并将它们关联与菜单根据需要。Since you must specify a menu that is associated with this collection, you cannot create multiple menu item collections and associate them with a menu as needed. 若要切换与菜单相关联的菜单项，必须清除的项的集合，并添加要向集合显示的菜单项。In order to switch the menu items associated with a menu, you must clear the collection of items and add the menu items to display to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Count`属性存储的数目分配给集合的对象。The `Count` property holds the number of objects assigned to the collection. 你可以使用`Count`作为上限的一个循环来循环访问集合的属性值。You can use the `Count` property value as the upper bounds of a loop to iterate through a collection. 请记住，集合的索引值是从零开始的索引，因此你必须从减去 1 循环变量。Keep in mind, the index value of a collection is a zero-based index, so you must subtract one from the looping variable. 如果你不考虑为此，将超过上限的集合，并引发异常。If you do not account for this, you will exceed the upper bounds of the collection and throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建主菜单中， `myMainMenu`，具有一个， `File`，具有三个子菜单项： `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with one , `File`, that has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用`Count`属性，可以计算中的对象数`File`菜单并在消息框中显示此数量。Using the `Count` property, you count the number of objects in the `File` menu and display this number in a message box. 此示例需要你已创建名为`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/CPP/countitems.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/CS/countitems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/VB/countitems.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从菜单项集合，所有后续的菜单项将上移集合中的一个位置删除。When a is removed from the menu item collection, all subsequent menu items are moved up one position in the collection. 你可以使用此版本的`Remove`删除特定使用的引用从集合要删除。You can use this version of the `Remove` to remove a specific from the collection using a reference to the to be removed. 如果你不具有对引用你想要删除，你可以使用接受索引对应于作为一个参数，此方法的其他版本要删除。If you do not have a reference to the that you want to remove, you can use the other version of this method that accepts, as a parameter, an index corresponding to the to be removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建主菜单中， `myMainMenu`，包含两个对象，`File`和`Edit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with two objects, `File` and `Edit`. `File`菜单还拥有三个子菜单项： `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The `File` menu has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用`Remove`方法，你移除`Open`项从`File`菜单集合。Using the `Remove` method, you remove the `Open` item from the `File` menu collection. 此示例需要你已创建名为`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`.
